abstract.p: Matsushita Electric Industrial Co reports half-year consolidated net profit of 51.4 billion yen ($73 million), up 51 percent from year earlier (S)

block.p: Matsushita Electric Industrial, maker of the Panasonic brand of electronics, reported a half-year consolidated net profit of 51.4 billion yen ($473 million), up 51 percent from a year earlier. Matsushita, Japan's largest home electronics manufacturer, posted better-than-expected results for the April-September period because sales of PC's, cellular phones, electric components and other electronic products grew faster over the last six months than anticipated, the company said. The company expects to record a full-year net profit of 102 billion yen on sales of 7.63 trillion yen for the year ending March 2001.

The company expects to record a full-year net profit of 102 billion yen on sales of 7.63 trillion yen for the year ending March 2001.
